<BOS> <SCR> making scrambled eggs <ESCR>: <BEVENT> remove egg carton from refrigerator. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> open egg carton. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> choose how many eggs you are going to scramble. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> turn eye of stove on. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> set pan or skillet on eye of stove. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> allow pan to heat while continuing to prepare eggs. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> get a bowl. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> crack eggs open into bowl. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> add a little water or milk to eggs, about 1 teaspoon. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> add salt and pepper to taste. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> beat vigorously with a fork or whisk till mixed well. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> spray pan with non stick spray, can add butter as well if you choose. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> add eggs to pan and swirl around till evenly spread in pan. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> when eggs start to bubble around the edges, gently scrape with spatula. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> repeat swirl till eggs are cooked through. <EEVENT> <BEVENT> enjoy!! <EEVENT> <EOS>
